summary: REQ-21 appears implemented via a new assetlinks.json with placeholder package name and SHA-256. REQ-23 manifest/index.html consistency appears implemented and the publishing doc includes the requested exact PWA values (per the visible excerpt). For REQ-22, the diff summary claims full Bubblewrap flow + troubleshooting, but the provided doc content is truncated before any Bubblewrap commands/troubleshooting are shown, so those parts cannot be verified from the evidence. The diff also includes substantial unrequested game/theme changes unrelated to Play Store/TWA readiness.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_PUBLISHING.md to include complete Bubblewrap (install/init/build) commands with placeholders; keystore + signed AAB steps; troubleshooting that explicitly references the error string `Unable to create your app`; and a PWA verification checklist (HTTPS, manifest, icons, assetlinks).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary asserts these sections exist, but the provided truncated content of PLAY_STORE_PUBLISHING.md only shows steps through the beginning of keystore creation and does not include any visible Bubblewrap commands, the exact error string, or the required troubleshooting/checklist content. Cannot confirm implementation from available evidence.
evidence: frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_PUBLISHING.md (truncated in diff; no Bubblewrap commands/troubleshooting visible)

hallucinated_features.description: Major game/app scope changes introducing/rewriting a battle-royale style game (new BattleGame, useBattleGame, enemies/projectiles, HUD/touch controls, multiple game screens), plus significant styling/theme overhauls (new global CSS color system, Tailwind theme updates, Google Fonts).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-21/22/23, which are limited to TWA/Digital Asset Links, Play Store publishing documentation, and PWA metadata consistency/documentation.
